name: sidetest
description: An extension to navigate from and to test files

commands.title: Side test: Open test file side by side
Side test: Open source file side by side

sidetest.unitTest.subFolder.description: The subfolder to look in for test, relative to the file under test. Default is null, the test file is in the same folder as the source file.

sidetest.source.rootFolder.description: The root folder containing the sources. Used in conjunction with unitTest.rootFolder to locate the source for a test file.

sidetest.unitTest.rootFolder.description: The root folder containing the tests. When used, the test file location must match the path of the file under test in the main source folder.

sidetest.unitTest.preExtensionSuffix.description: The suffix to put between the filename and extension to find the matching test. For example the value [spec] would make a.js search for a.spec.js. Default value is [spec]

sitetest.unitTest.prefix.description: This is a prefix to add to the original filename to find the matching test file. For example [test_] would match calculator.py with test_calculator.py.

sitetest.unitTest.suffix.description: This is a suffix to add to the original filename to find the matching test file. For example [_test] would match calculator.py with calculator_test.py. This is different from [preExtensionSuffix] because this one append to the original filename, while [preExtensionSuffix] creates a second extension to prefix the original extension.

sidetest.createTestIfMissing.description: Automatically create the test file when trying to open and the test is missing.
